duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement CGI Info Advantage (version 3.9, 3.10, or 3.11) for business analysis and decision making.
Configure and test HR / Payroll systems, ensuring functionality and accuracy.
Manage project timelines, resources, and deliverables for successful implementation.
Utilize analytical skills to interpret data and provide insights for business decisions.
Communicate effectively with team members and stakeholders, ensuring alignment and progress.
Prioritize tasks, manage time efficiently, and meet deadlines effectively.
